title: Sensitive Data Under Web Root
overview: The application stores sensitive data under the web document root with insufficient access control, which might make it accessible to untrusted parties.
remediation: ::PHASE:Implementation System Configuration:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Avoid storing information under the web root directory.::PHASE:System Configuration:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Access control permissions should be set to prevent reading/writing of sensitive files inside/outside of the web directory.::
